TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DependencyObjectCodeDomSerializer extends System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Provides objects with CodeDOM serialization services. This is the base class from which other CodeDOM serializers, such as the , are inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
DependencyObjectCodeDomSerializer controls the generation of component initialization code for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject> class at design time.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object Serialize (System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager manager, object obj);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object Serialize(class System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager manager, object obj) cil managed

Docs.param: The serialization manager to use during serialization.
Docs.summary: Serializes the specified object into a CodeDOM object.
Docs.returns: A CodeDOM object that represents the object that has been serialized.
Docs.exception: or contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
